column5: Hello all im sure most of you hardwater fishing people have thought of ice fishing several times by now so i thought id ask a ? you all know im a quinte boy so my question is this Whats your 3 favorite lures when icefishing quinte walleye  Hawg Hunter
1) Buckshot Rattle spoon. 2) Jigging Rapala 3) Technie-Glo frostee jigging spoon.
Kastmaster/Mr Champ    Hawger   Swedish Pimple   Bring on the hardwater (After fall fishing season  )

Minnows on a jiggy whopper Minnows on a jiggy whopper and Minnows on a jiggy whopper.  Why break away from what works. , , , , , , ,Oops,I just seen it was for the BOQ. Bet it would work there too.LOL

Hawg...good to see you around. I've been thinking about the hard water since the begining of Sept. Can't wait to put a hurt on the Perch.  I am no where near qualified enough to answer this question lol.  -Dave
Green Mr. Champ Half and half williams whitefish #50 size Green swedish pimple  A small chub on all 3 hooks of the trebles.   Sinker
